## isDataSourceRef() function

### isDataSourceRef() function

Returns true if the argument is a DataSourceRef

<b>Signature</b>

```typescript
export declare function isDataSourceRef(ref: DataSourceRef | string | null): ref is DataSourceRef;
```
<b>Import</b>

```typescript
import { isDataSourceRef } from '@grafana/data';
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  ref | <code>DataSourceRef &#124; string &#124; null</code> |  |

`ref is DataSourceRef`
